00061 // Valid options for MTOUCH_INTEGRATION_TYPE
00062 #define MTOUCH_CONTROLS_ISR             0
00063 #define MTOUCH_CALLED_FROM_ISR          1
00064 #define MTOUCH_CALLED_FROM_MAINLOOP     2
00065 
00066 // Valid options for MTOUCH_SCAN_FUNCTIONALITY
00067 #define MTOUCH_SCANS_ONE_SENSOR         0
00068 #define MTOUCH_SCANS_ALL_SENSORS        1
00069 
00070 // Valid options for MTOUCH_ADC_CONTROL
00071 #define MTOUCH_ALWAYS_CONTROLS_ADC      0
00072 #define MTOUCH_RELEASES_ADC_AFTER_SCAN  1
00073 
00074 // Valid options for MTOUCH_PROXIMITY_SORT
00075 #define MTOUCH_PROX_FAST                0
00076 #define MTOUCH_PROX_EFFICIENT           1
00077 #define MTOUCH_PROX_NEW                 2
